message: Fila 10 US is larger than Acsis 10 US. Since I live outside the USA, I could not return the order - be careful those who live abroad. The quality is better than new balance - soft, comfortable, sewn well

I just purchased my normal shoe size, 9.5 in regular.  They didn't fit and in fact hurt my feet.  I'm buying a size up and wide to see if it works better.  They fit ok at first, but after a while on my feet, I felt my toes and top of my feet near the 5t proximal phalynx bones.  Also, I developed a blister on my foot and had to remove my shoes.  I returned them the next day and will update you on the fit of the larger size.

Not sure how material to make shoe will hold up.  I applied black polish and they look better.  The dole is great.  Just buy a boot brush if you walk in dirt or mud.  It will keep from bring in dirt at work or office.

Great price for slip-resistant shoes plus has memory foam. If you work in a restaurant as a server those are perfect. The front on the shoe is tight. I am 7 but just incase got 7.5 and is perfect for me. So you might consider getting half size bigger.
they do the job just make my feet hurt after a couple hours
I work on a cement floor all days, and as plus size gal these shoes are the best.  My feet dont hurt after a long day.
Unpacked the shoes and wore them for the next 3 days. Did a lot of walking and the shoes were very comfortable.
If you wear a 7.5 in women. I recommend getting the 8.. fits a little snug.. But all in all I recommend shoe for kitchen work.. Just get a half size bigger
needed a half a size bigger
The only problem I had was a shoe string broke. I will still order another pair when I need them
Perfectly fitted. But if you have wife feet, I would not recommend them. I have slider feet and they are snug. A wider foot would not be comfy in these.
Great Product!
Great! I love the shoes they’re better than I expected because I have bought mini slip resistant shoes and they weren’t slip resistant they were very slippery I will purchase these again thank you

I've worn them for a few 8 hour shifts, and so far, they're really nice. I'm on my feet for almost the entire time, and they've been pretty comfortable and have held up really well. Obviously, I'm tired of standing by the end of my shift, but my feet are nowhere near as sore as they would be if I was wearing regular shoes.

Very comfy OMG my dawgs are BARKING ROUGH ROUGH MY TOES FEEL GOOD VERY GOOD SHOWS BARK BARK MY DAWGS ARE ESCAPING BARK BARK THEY ARE SO COMFY BARK BARK THEY ARE IN THE DOG HOUSE, overall the form factor and comfort ability of the shoes is most excellent these shoes are great for casual and work related activities I'd recommend them to all my friends and family and everyone I see on the street and in my walls ❤️

Perfect for nurses and especially for those needing all white and waterproof shoes for nursing school.

Ordered a wide because I have wide feet but forgot these do stretch some and should have ordered the regular ones. This is my 3rd pair and I am constantly on the go in a grocery store. The last ones lasted almost 2 years!
I like the way these shoes fit.  Third pair I’ve bought.  Matter o of fact, I bought a pair in white too - so four pair now!
I like the price the look the style the support. they are comfortable
Perfect shoes for my daughter for work 👌 good price too!

I work as a waitress and these are truly slip resistant shoes. I've tried other brands and more expensive supposedly "non-slip" shoes but I would always have to be really careful at work. Not only do these work great but they're cute!

(Short version: these shoes work well for long  shifts in a slower fast food place, although may be a lil tight.) My old shoes had finally given up after a couple months of gluing and re-gluing them, to my coworkers horror. They convinced me to buy a new pair, so I scoured online until finding these; they seemed to be adequate. I order them, and reglue my old shoes one last time to use while waiting for these to arrive. They finally arrived before work one day, and I was excited to wear them that night. I tried them on prior to leaving. They were a little tighter than expected, but otherwise not a bad fit--a miracle, considering I have quite large feet. I show up to work and of course my coworkers notice immediately I have new, non-ragedy shoes. I don't have much to say about the appearance of these, as I don't think it really matters. They're shoes for doing a job. Which, they do a fine job of. I have yet to slip and fall in my work place aside from places where the shoes don't matter (ie. some genius decides to leave a huge grease spill in the middle of the floor without informing anyone, or someone spills a bunch of fries and decides not to clean them up.) It is important to note, however, that while I have used these shoes for 30+ hour work weeks for months without any slipping issues, I also work at a low-volume store where we try to keep the floor as non-slippery as possible. If you work at a grease soaked McDonald's, you may form a different opinion of these shoes than I have. All in all, these shoes have worked well for my specific needs, and I will probably buy another pair in the same size whenever I wear my current ones out
Works great for a 6 hour shift- not quite enough arch support for wearing all day
Use it for onsite work for security guard company and the person loves it
I got these for nursing school clinical. I love them! Comfy for most of the day- just wish there was a little more arch support.
Stitching seems to come apart about 3 months in but I wear as custodian & walk about 8 to 10 miles a day.
Super comfortable! Love them!
I like the shoes. They’re plush and my feet don’t hurt even after a long days work
El producto es tal como lo esperaba. Me sorprendió la rapidez en la entrega, incluso unos días antes de la fecha programada. Hice una muy buena elección
only sue for work as we need all black shoes--they serve their purpose and are comfortable enough for an 8 hour period of standing on my feet all day
Bought for working in restaurant with slippery floors. Shoes perform great. Sturdy and well made, feet feel good after standing for 10 hours straight. Highly recommend!
Non-slip works well in a kitchen environment
Very comfortable. Could use more padding, but I am an old lady.
Excelente tenis cómodos me rallaron correctamente gracias Fila

I work in a salon and I got these shoes for comfort as I'm on my feet all day. These shoes have ok comfort and support, but it's kind of pointless for me to wear them considering the tread is so strange on them, it picks up anything and everything and I end up tracking it all over the floor at the salon, so I can't even wear them for what I got them for. Very frustrating.

I have worn these before in a 8 but this time they were too small. I tried thin socks, removing the pad and they still rubbed my toes so I'm unable to wear them. I would definitely recommend half a size up not just because of the size running small but you will definitely need to add in your own inserts for support/comfort. The ones that come with these shoes are flat with no padding. They are nice looking shoes and a great price so it is unfortunate I cannot wear them.
The shoes are well made, but the insoles are completely without arch support. I’m also upset that I paid $49.99 for these and they were discounted to about $35 on the day I received them.
no complaints, comfy and my feet hurt less than my last pair of work shoes

I didn't realize that I needed more ankle support until I walked a mile and a half with these shoes. My back is really sensitive to shoes, so I don't take it personally, I am just learning more kinks about how particular my feet are.  A very nice shoe.

I have never in my life worn such comfortable and supportive work shoes. I really didn't want to take them off when I got home!!! More expensive shoes can't compare to these...I highly recommend these work shoes!

They're ugly and fairly comfy. My gf hated seeing me in them and I don't blame her. I was broke starting my food service job and for $20 this shoe gets the job done. I wore them working full time for a year and they finally gave out exactly a year later. I'm going to get something else to replace them but if you just need a pair for a job you don't think you'll have that long I'd say go for it and get some shoe inserts.
I love these shoes because its all black, low key but stylish. I wore them to my beauty school everyday, spend a lot of time standing and walking around. They are really comfortable.
I like the width, fits good and I use it for work.
Love how wide it is. The comfort is amazing.

I am a mail carrier with a 10 mile walking route. I absolutely love these shoes. They are the only brand comfortable on my feet. Everyone has their own preference when it comes to shoes as everyone’s feet are built differently. These shoes are very comfortable for me and have never given me blisters. They have a soft lining. Being that I walk 50-60 miles per week on my route I do blow through the soles every 3-4 months so I order them often. They also do a good job keeping my feet dry when I walk through the morning dew and in light rain.
I’m glad I got these tennis shoes they are amazing. Very comfortable my feet are very happy.
They are the perfect bit very durable

I got these shoes bc I have plantar fasciitis and standing for long hours kill my feet. When I started to wear these, they did help but not as much as I thought. I bought dr. Schols insoles but they didn’t help at all and made the pain worse. I bet there’s better shoes that suit the needs for people with plantar fasciitis, but if you need an affordable option then these will do.

I don't know why all the bad reviews, these shoes have lasted me for almost 2 years. Yes, I know it's time to replace them because I've worn them out right about now . . . but they are still so comfortable. They don't have much arch, but I always insert "arch supports" . . . and I have to buy my shoes WIDE because my little toes seem to like to spread their little selves while am walking, so I need the extra room. Am going to replace them now because I know you don't suppose to wear the same shoes regularly for over 6 -12 months. It'll change your gait . . . which can cause your back to hurt. Did you know that???
They are not comfortable for standing up at all and no arch support at all

Walker.

i work in retail - on my feet pretty much the whole shift.  i wear these shoes most days.  after 2 yrs they are starting to show some wear. getting ready to order another pair.  i have a heel spur and these shoes offer quite good support. i used to wear a size 6 in womens. i don't know if my feet are wider or companies have changed how they make shoes. but the past oh 5 yrs i have had to get shoes in size 7 or 7.5 wide.  i also am the type to tie my laces once then slide in/ out of my shoes. ( drives hubby crazy tho i don't know why). but i do know this can wear down a shoe quicker. they can get hot in summer time. so i tend to alternate my shoes more in the summer.  they are not snazzy or fancy with bows and glitter and unicorn rainbow farts... but they are well made - can handle a good bit of abuse - give me support and relief with a heel spur. i have never thrown them in the washer - just a wipe down with a damp rag.  i have never slipped or fallen  in them. the price is quite good for 2 yrs of frequent wear.  there is good room in the toe area - no pinching.
They comfy , no complaints.

So these shoes are definitely better than my last pair I had for work and I stand and walk five days a week for 8 hours in these shoes. I've maybe had these shoes for a little over a month already and they seem to get "worn out" or feel kinda loose pretty quick and I just noticed a few weeks ago the inside of the shoes already are getting holes or falling apart :/ the first couple of weeks these shoes felt like heaven and fit my wide feet pretty well over all I would probably purchase again downside it they probably won't last the year for me.
They are so comfortable until the memory foam wears out. I will be buying again
Perfect for work shoes. Durable and comfortable.
I bought a half size too small, but they have still been serving me well. Good sturdy shoes with comfort.
Lioe the design of the shoe but more importantly I like the comfortable of the wear.

Ran a hair too short, my toes went over the edge of the memory foam, but not to the end of the shoe. There is also zero in the way of cushioning & support beyond the thin foam pad, it's all sole. Returning it today.
Good work shoes

I go through work shoes frequently and usually get the same Dr. Scholls pair. Saw these here at a good price and decided why not. I'm very happy I did. Been wearing them for about a month now and they are very comfortable. I didn't realize how comfy the memory foam footbed was until I randomly wore my old shoes to work one day. I always need a Wide, which I got, and they are just a touch wider than I would like (which is why I gave a 4 and not a 5.) At first my foot was sliding around too much but it was easily remedied with thicker socks. Well worth the price so far

Go up a half size because the toe box is really tight. I stretched them with shoe trees. It helped a lot. I was also disappointed with the support. I thought they’d have more. I put inserts in and that helped, too.

I will preface this with: I have large feet. It's a burden as a woman. I was my grandmother's size 7 before I was old enough to wear high heels. Before I usually bought shoes at payless. But they've gone out of business, leaving many large feeted women scrambling. I bought a few pairs in their going out of business sales. And as shoes do, they wore out. Finally I tried Amazon. After many. Many failed attempts in other stores. These fit perfectly. I bought 2 pairs! (They salt where I live in winter and I feared them breaking down before summer).
True to size, very comfortable for all day wear.
To plastic but they will be fine. Worn just once

These are truly the best shoes I own and the only ones I wear. I purchased them for my food industry job and they were immediately a big relief in my life and career. They are incredibly comfortable and I've recommended them to at least three other people. Not only will my feet not hurt even a tiny bit after an 8 hour shift, but they also didn't even hurt until hour 10 at Disneyland. I love these. They look great, they feel great, they're comfortable, and the price for the wear and tear they can take is perfect. GO FILA!!

I walk a lot, I'm a dog walker and my dog loves to run, so i wear them while i work and when i run and never have a problem. They are so comfortable, i have weak feet joints and always have to see doctors, but this shoes gives me so much arch support and the width is so perfect to my feet it secures it, and i never get hurt! The toe box is just right (i guess depends on you foot a lot but at least mine...) it has lots of room but doesn't feel loose. If you are out and about / hiking/ running, this are perfect

I work as a barista at Starbucks, so we get slippery floors because we drop ice and drinks spill. These shoes are heaven on the floor, because I have a very firm grip. They make me feel confident enough to pick up my speed sometimes, I’m able to job and run in these on our floors. Definitely worth it even if they don’t look the best they sure work :)
Shoe laces two long.

I wanted a pair of non slip soles for working conditions, since many jobs now require them.  I've been wearing these shoes for so much more.  They look somewhere between a sneaker and work shoe with all the comfort and support of a sneaker. I've worn the brand before, so I was comfortable knowing what the fit would be before I ordered.  I also recommended these to my barista daughter, who is on her feet all day.
Great Shoe but not my Size to tight

Bought these for my mom, who works as a waitress and is on her feet all day. It's only been a couple weeks and she says they feel better than the Sketchers she's always used. If they last longer than 6 months, I'll probably upgrade to 5 stars.
It did what I needed it to do
This FILA work shoe is the best.  It is comfortable and I and my feet are not tired at the end of shift. This is my 6th pair.  I have tried others, but always come back to FILA.

I calculate I've spent about 576 hours in these shoes, spread out over an 8-month period. I wash cars, so these shoes have spent time in a wash bay on smooth concrete, as well as outside on a parking lot. They are extremely comfortable and have good traction in a wet environment.  However they are wearing out faster than I would normally expect; starting to tear at the seams on the upper, and the tread is wearing on the heel and ball.  BUT they are priced right, and easy to replace at this price. They are not waterproof, but resist splashing better than mesh-type running shoes. I would buy them again for the comfort alone. I do recommend a cushioned insole, as the included one wears out fairly quickly.

I have wide feet. Not that it’s a bad thing, but I find it can make it hard to find shoes that fit. I ordered these in Women’s 8.5 Wide. First try on, my heart sank, they felt really tight through the toe area. I squashed my fear, wore them with thinner socks for a 6 hour shift in the kitchen & they are WONDERFUL! My feet, ankles and legs did NOT hurt. I compare the comfort level to my work Skechers and these really do work. I love the sole, no slipping or sliding on the floor. I also like that these are available in “pure” white and I will be ordering a black pair soon! They seemed to help stabilize my ankles, without being high tops. No rubbing, the heel stays put, they could stand a bit more arch support, but that’s not a deal breaker for me! I would recommend to my friends!
Cómodo para larga jornada de trabajo
The memory foam is so comfortable, but the width is way more comfortable now it’s in Wide. Hard to find.
I’ve been wearing them for over a month now. A bit stiff, and not as comfortable as my sketcher work shoes. But they feel well made and I think they are a good value.
I use them for work and everyday.

I like these shoes because they are slip resistant. I wear them outside when it has rained or is raining. They are very heavy so I don't wear them often. Also, when I wear ankle socks, water from the street when I'm walking in the rain often splashes up on my ankles because these shoes do not cover my ankles.

Great shoe at first. Fits great. Feels good. I purchased Aug 20th. Only just barely over a month later and they are falling apart. For being the price and all I figured I would get at least a couple months out of them, but no… just over a month. Dissatisfied for certain.
When I found these, they are the only ones I will wear now
